nodes.text: Andy Mangels (born December 22, 1966)[source?] is the American author of the 1995 reference book The Essential Guide to Characters, the script author of the 1996 Dark Horse Comics one-shot Boba Fett: Twin Engines of Destruction, and the writer of the feature "Just Who Is Boba Fett?" in the 1998 one-shot magazine Star Wars: Boba Fett.
